MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L19 postcode area of Liverpool, affecting properties in Woodhey Road and surrounding streets. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of extensive repairs required to the underground cable network. Our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:33PM on 28th March 2021.
